channel.title: New combat
channel.description:
Usually I don't post videos but I thought yous would find it intresting. I know I'm talking bullshit but mute it or w.e.
Powertrain to fuck right now, npcs take forever to kill. took me like an hour to get kc for bandos:L, lower level pvm = easier, higher lvl pvm = harder. Pking requires more skill/a lot of random clicking lol. Can easily be abused by having multiple sets of armour etc. Better but worse in my opinion, I'd say I prefer old combat tbh. This will probably fix the eco, takes forever to kill npcs lolol. i hate the ffa wildi though, hope they make it 1v1 again.. constant teaming isn't fun. oh and the dragon 2h cbow (or w.e. its called) is shit, zarytes better than it nevermind the double ccbs.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C6ivzzIwNDQ&feature=youtu.be

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

My biggest problems so far how threshold abilities don’t drain the adrenaline bar, despite being extremely powerful and how the combat formula has serious logic flaws in regards to the capabilities of opponents (mostly in the field of prayer, summoning, and a lack of combining attack and strength for melee fighters).

Edit: Oh and, Nex is only level 220 now.

Read full topic

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

I like the beta just because I can mess about with the random stuff from my bank which I never get to use such as monkeys in a barrel then just re import the save again :L I will probably like the combat system more when I begin to understand it but I have spend around 90% of my time on the beta just messing about

For example…

tutorialInterfaceBetaServer.png800×600

Read full topic

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Tried it out earlier and I really don’t like it. It looks like the combat (or at least the beta’s combat) will be focused entirely around PvP. Trying to kill any boss monsters takes damn forever and seems overall not worth it. Sure, other monsters like chaos dwarves and the such are easy, but then again, you’re wearing full torva and a divine with overloads. If this is how it stays, I will be pissed.

Plus, dominion gloves are completely devalued now that they only have their stats (which I don’t even think are properly retained). The effects are gone as far as I can tell, which is the primary reason as to why they are used.

Read full topic

Just saw frells mouse, I’d buy that for rs tbh lol.
OOh nice Jc:P. I think its OP personally ><.

They can, they only get 1 bar rather than 5 bars to hold all the abilities though.

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I just tried it… A bit confusing at first, haha… I was at a 9:1 KD though! That special move that hits 400% of what you would have hit is epic…

Does anyone know whether F2P can use those moves also?

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

the elve age:

What did you expect of the dragon crossbow, if the chaotic one didn’t ever hit any better, what made you think this one would? Your expectations are way too high.

The ccb doesn’t hit higher but its pretty good(bossing its amazing), I expected the dragon cbow to be similar or hard hitting, but its neither. I was expecting it be good as its the s’post to be the best non chaotic cbow they have released lol.

[quote=“Frell, post:24, topic:447085”]Ahahha I can already see runescape players clicking the abilities

thats what I have this for

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:21, topic:447085”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=549988.msg4033185#msg4033185 date=1340953851]

How does the armor application with bonus health apply?

Just like nex armours, they have assigned hp bonuses. You put it on you gain the bonus, you take it of you loose the bonus. You also get hp bonuses from weapons I believe(not 100% sure though but I know godsword gives some type of non offensive bonus).
[/quote]

It said someone wear armor could have up to 15x hp… Is it really that much?[/quote]
I had 7.5k normally, over 10k with rocktails so yeah:P.

Read full topic

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=549988.msg4032120#msg4032120 date=1340883634] I doubt they will not buff up brews along with only shit. I hate how you think this is the real thing, so what if dcbow sucks, if people give feedback then they will re look over it. [/quote] They have updated brews, their really bad now. But you only need like 1 sip of restore to 1 flask of brew, a whole flask heals just under what 2 rocktails would heal.. I think their focusing on the heal yourself abilities and summoning for long term pvm'ing etc. I don't, its a base for the real thing which I'm treating it as. Things will change I know but from past experiance with Jagex will most likely stick with the basic structure of the system thats being used in the BETA. I was just mentioning it, it seems to be the next strongest c bow(not best) c'bow in rs and its not good, the best bolts it can use is rune which confuses me also. Thought it'd be useful to know.

What i’m getting at is that it is a beta, yes it is a base for the real thing but they have changed tons of things and more than likely not even tested everything because there’s so to add. BTW, an example is the bow, they wouldn’t make rune better than dragon so obviously it will get changed before the live update. It wouldn’t make sense for them to make brews shit but that is why they are listening to us about things that need changing because its us who plays not them.

From past experience Jagex might not have been co-operative but they know this is the biggest update yet, so they won’t stick with what they have unless its good. It’s like the new nex armour, it isn’t degradable in the beta but the rest of the armour is… Just doesn’t make sense.

Read full topic

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Loveandpower:

I’ve been told you can easily be destroyed by fire giants cause it’s multi

I haven’t tried multi npc combat but i can imagine it being pretty hard. TDS glacors etc are supposed to be incredibly hard. I think they’ll have to add a gurenteed good drop to bosses or something unless they modify it.

xxlukexx:

I doubt they will not buff up brews along with only shit. I hate how you think this is the real thing, so what if dcbow sucks, if people give feedback then they will re look over it.

They have updated brews, their really bad now. But you only need like 1 sip of restore to 1 flask of brew, a whole flask heals just under what 2 rocktails would heal… I think their focusing on the heal yourself abilities and summoning for long term pvm’ing etc.
I don’t, its a base for the real thing which I’m treating it as. Things will change I know but from past experiance with Jagex will most likely stick with the basic structure of the system thats being used in the BETA.
I was just mentioning it, it seems to be the next strongest c bow(not best) c’bow in rs and its not good, the best bolts it can use is rune which confuses me also. Thought it’d be useful to know.

Jc22493:

You hit much higher, meaning the lowered experience rate hasn’t really changed total experience gained.

Comparing xp rates I get in Rs and to what I get in the beta I’m going to estimate about a 40%-30% xp loss. You get more xp per kill, about double BUT it takes faaar longer to kill npcs. Getting bandos kc took me about 30mins, takes me usually about 10mins. You get xp per kill, not per hit in the beta.

Read full topic

item.title: New combat
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:4, topic:447085”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=549988.msg4031384#msg4031384 date=1340808996]
I forgot to mention xp rates are super slow so train your combat now! you get xp per kill, not per hit and killing them takes ages, i’d say about 25-40% slower
[/quote]

It’s a beta. Since you can basically use any item you want, they don’t want you training with the powerful items. Also, don’t you hit higher in the new combat?[/quote]
You don’t keep any levels/items you gain so i think its the normal xp rates (they’ll probably adjust it though), but of course you may be right and I may be wrong.
You do, you hit much higher but they have MUCH higher hp than before, probably more than the player has. Brews aren’t that good now, i’m not sure but I think rocktails heal overall a lil bit less.

Acorn_:

I wanna play now.

Read full topic
